message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less. How about $110?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I've got to make a living too. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about we split the difference and go with $117.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $128, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Let's try $129.50
